body_html:
I will close this PR for now; I don't believe this is a bug. @aselle, if you want to change my mind, please review.

I would be happy to consider a PR which clarifies the definition of the intensity representation using integers, since it appears to be confusing.

body:
I will close this PR for now; I don't believe this is a bug. @aselle, if you want to change my mind, please review. 

I would be happy to consider a PR which clarifies the definition of the intensity representation using integers, since it appears to be confusing.
